overview: When King Motecuzoma dies in 1468, a drought sets upon the Mexicas' land. The younger Motecuzoma sends a retinue to collect tributes from the peasants and make an offering to Coatlicue at Aztl치n, the home of their ancestors. The peasant Ollin finds a discarded tribute and makes his own journey to Aztl치n to appease his rulers.
title: Return to Aztl치n
